body_html:
@rdipietro I tried to extend your code to a vanilla GRU. Also removed the clipping therefore and replaced Gradient Descent with Adagrad.
Consequently convergence is now much faster.
Can you please verify the code ?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/16534925/
(I know it's much dirty!)

body:
@rdipietro I tried to extend your code to a vanilla GRU. Also removed the clipping therefore and replaced Gradient Descent with Adagrad.
Consequently convergence is now much faster.
Can you please verify the code ?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/16534925/
(I know it's much dirty!)
